task.title: Translating repetitions
task.shortdesc: Learn how to simplify your translation process in memoQ by creating a view containing only repetitions.

taskbody.context: If your DITA project contains a lot of repetitive content, it may be useful to include all repetitions in one view. To create a view containing all repetitions in , follow these steps:

step.cmd: Go to Project home Translations and select all files.
Right-click on the files and choose Create View.

image.alt: The 'Create View' option in memoQ 'Translations' screen

step.cmd: In the Create view dialog, enter the Name of the view, select Extract repetitions and click OK.

taskbody.result:
Now you can work on a view containing all repeating segments in your project.
An example memoQ view containing repetitions
